item.title: Python IDE on the iPad Pro
item.description: My career is kind of colourful. I was working on aircraft systems, VoIP HW & SW, developing Linux kernel drivers, Linux distributions, OpenOffice.org and many other low level (RTOS) & high level (desktop applications) stuff. Linux nerd. I said enough one day. I wanted to just work and wasnâ€™t willing to continue wasting my time with searching how to workaround this and that. Bye bye Linux, did spend nice 10 years with you.
